thread.title: Huge fire breaks out in Sharjah residential building
thread.title_full: Huge fire breaks out in Sharjah residential building

title: Huge fire breaks out in Sharjah residential building
text:
Huge fire breaks out in Sharjah residential building Amira Agarib /Sharjah Filed on February 5, 2017 | Last updated on February 5, 2017 at 11.45 am Share 
Picture used for illustrative purposes alone (KT file photo) Forensic experts of Sharjah Police have launched an investigation to find out cause of fire. The Sharjah Civil Defense put out a huge fire which erupted in a residential building in Al Buhaira area in Sharjah on Saturday at around 6.30pm. The operation room of Sharjah Civil Defense received information that a fire had broken out in an apartment located on the third floor of a 12 storey building. Fire engines and fire brigades from Samnan and Muwailih stations were rushed to the site and the building was evacuated. The blaze was brought under control by civil defense later on. Colonel Sami Khamis Al Naqbi, Director-General of Sharjah Civil Defence said that the fire gutted the apartment completely but no injuries have been reported. He said that the forensic experts of Sharjah Police have launched an investigation to find out cause of fire.
